_sText:
de_fastline from Counter-Strike: Condition Zero!

I am not the creator of this map and i own no rights to it.


I made the CSGO port of this map 2 years ago. That map was using a decompiled version of fastline.

This version is using a leaked VMF i found online. All i had to do was throw my textures and models i decompiled/extracted from my previous fastline port into here.

What's the difference between this version and my CSGO port?

  • This version is more optimized (since it's using the original VMF file)
  • I added different lighting around the map (it actually comes from the ceiling lights now)
  • The texture issues i had from decompiling the original BSP are gone

What's the difference between this and CSCZ?

  • I cannot for the life of me figure out how to recreate the way they edited the window textures on the train and police room. 
  • The lighting was added by me, some of the original lighting still exists on the train and vents (If i didn't add any lights to the map, it'd be all dark). 
  • The floodlight model has a texture error that still exists on CSCZ that is fixed on my version. 
  • Most of the ceiling light textures i swapped for textures of them being on (would not make sense for them to be off when light comes out of them). 
  • Sounds are missing. The VMF file has entities for them, but i could not find them in the CSCZ files... also it's dead silent in the CSCZ version anyway.
  • Textures in my version are not using texture filtering, meaning the textures aren't blurry.

Feel free to decompile the map to edit for your liking. I don't need credit.
